joehung302 wrote:
> I'm bringing up this issue again.
> 
> First of all, we're now doing repeatable 5B+ crawling using Heritrix. 
> Thanks to you guys.
> 
> These days we've got quite a few complaints about Heritrix not 
> honoring the "crawl-delay" parameter. Is this still a planned feature?
> 
> Or, how can we help to make it happen? ;)

As this only requires shuttling an externally-provided number into the 
existing min-delay-ms setting, it should be pretty simple, but was 
overlooked as we prioritized issues for 1.14. I'll take a look soon.

I'll also use this as a chance to remind people that they can vote for 
bugs they'd like fixed via the JIRA issue tracker for Heritrix:

http://webteam.archive.org/jira/browse/HER?report=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.project:popularissues-panel

Part of issue triage leading up to any release is reviewing the popular 
issues, in case there are things we haven't prioritized internally that 
are still important to the wider community.

- Gordon @ IA
